reviews.text: Good establishment) Well done girls, they know who is drinking what. They serve quickly, several people at once. Always polite and friendly. Reading the previous comments, it seems that the people who write them are looking for someone to project their negative mood or childish insults on. Regarding "with a full mouth", I have never seen it, and if I did, I understand that they don't have such a lunch. Every day, several times I drink coffee in this coffee shop, everything is at the highest level as always!!!

Very nice coffee shop! Well done girls, customer oriented - they always know who is drinking what. Several people are served at once. Always polite and friendly. I read the previous comments and it seems that the people who write are exaggerating. If even "with a full mouth", as one lady wrote, although I did not notice this, then a person wants to eat and drink during the day. And regarding the previous comment, I witnessed a situation where the guy couldn't pay for the coffee, and he didn't have cash, and the girls started serving other customers in order not to delay the queue. This young man did not like it. I drink coffee in this coffee shop several times every day. And everything is always good.

went in for a cold drink. two ladies were sitting, eating. when she approached, she began to speak alone with her mouth full. I understand what it's like to work in a coffee shop and we're all people, but you could sit down to eat, only one would take orders. took bumble the coffee tastes very bitter and burnt. service in Russian. please take steps to recruit the right staff and service. thank you

There were two ladies, one a dark HUMKA.
Please teach your staff to communicate with people. I stood for 10 minutes while they talked with their friends

The best service I've ever met in a coffee shop, the girls cheered me up, and even more coffee
made delicious
More such baristas and Ulitka will occupy the TOP coffee shops of Ukraine
